Everything I get from X-Force is fucked up. Anyone figure anything out with this Microsoft Visual C++ issue? I got one use out of this piece of garbage. Don't download or seed for X-Force, everything they upload is bullshit.
FOR EVERYONE WITH RUNTIME ERROR: Go to My Documents, and rename the "Mudbox" folder to "Mudbox old". This will reset the configuration of Mudbox, which is apparently being corrupted.
